mapper.select: select ksdm,ksmc,wdksdm,wdksjs,wz from gy_ksdm where wsks=1
select count(1) FROM web_ghksxx WHERE yyksdm= #{ksdm}
select jlxh,xq from gh_yzpbk where ksdm=#{platdeptid} and ysgh is not null
select count(*) from gh_yypbmx where pbjlxh=#{jlxh}
select count(*) from gh_yypbmx where pbjlxh=#{jlxh} AND yybz=0

select DISTINCT (A.jlxh) AS pbCode, to_char((case when (A.xq - case when func_get_week='星期一' then '1' when func_get_week='星期二' then '2' when func_get_week='星期三' then '3' when func_get_week='星期四' then '4' when func_get_week='星期五' then '5' when func_get_week='星期六' then '6' when func_get_week='星期日' then '7' end) >0 then (A.xq - case when func_get_week='星期一' then '1' when func_get_week='星期二' then '2' when func_get_week='星期三' then '3' when func_get_week='星期四' then '4' when func_get_week='星期五' then '5' when func_get_week='星期六' then '6' when func_get_week='星期日' then '7' end) when (A.xq - case when func_get_week='星期一' then '1' when func_get_week='星期二' then '2' when func_get_week='星期三' then '3' when func_get_week='星期四' then '4' when func_get_week='星期五' then '5' when func_get_week='星期六' then '6' when func_get_week='星期日' then '7' end) <= 0 then 7+ (A.xq - case when func_get_week='星期一' then '1' when func_get_week='星期二' then '2' when func_get_week='星期三' then '3' when func_get_week='星期四' then '4' when func_get_week='星期五' then '5' when func_get_week='星期六' then '6' when func_get_week='星期日' then '7' end) end)+sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') appdate, decode(FUN_GET_GH_MZLBMC(A.MZLBXH),'普通','1','专家','2','名医','3','2') AS schType, B.ghsjlb AS timeType, nvl(F.ghf,0) regfee, decode(C.jiagelb,'3',nvl(F.zlf_et,0),nvl(F.zlf,0)) treatfee, A.ysgh AS docCode, A.ksdm AS depCode, D.xm,D.xb, E.mc,C.ksmc, 0 numcount, 0 numremain FROM gh_yzpbk A,gh_yypbmx B,gy_ksdm C,gy_zgxx D,gy_gydm E,gh_mzlbk F where A.jlxh=B.pbjlxh AND A.ksdm=C.ksdm AND A.ysgh=D.zgid AND D.zc=E.dm AND A.mzlbxh =F.mzlbxh AND E.dmlb=13 AND A.jlxh=#{jlxh}
select b.ws_mzlbxh,b.DOCTOR_CODE,b.DEPT_CODE from GH_YYPBMX a ,MZYY_SCHEDUL b where rownum=1 and a.pbjlxh = b.JLXH and a.pbmxxh = #{pbmxxh}
select YLJGDM,YLJGMC,YLJGJS,YLJGDZ,YLJGMC,YLJGDJ, YLJGXZ,YLJGLB,YLJGDH, YLJGWZ,XXSCPB from web_yljgxx
select ksdm deptid,ksmc deptname,wdksjs description, GBKSDM stanid, '0' age, '0' maxage, '0'state, '0'category ,wsks genre from gy_ksdm where zfpb = 0 and flksdm <> '70024'

Select a.Zgid docCode, a.Xm docName, a.xb docSex, a.Ksdm Ksdm, c.Mc docTitle, (select ysjssm from WEB_GHYSXX where yyysdm = a.zgid) docInfo, (select yszgxk from WEB_GHYSXX where yyysdm = a.zgid) docDes, (select ysjssm from WEB_GHYSXX where yyysdm = a.zgid) specialty, '0' state From Gy_Zgxx a, Gy_Ksdm b, (Select Dm, Mc From Gy_Gydm Where Dmlb = 13) c Where a.Ksdm = b.Ksdm And a.Zc = c.Dm(+) and c.mc is not null And substr(a.Ysqx,0,1) = '1' and a.Zybz in (0,5,7)
And a.Ksdm =#{ksdm}
Select jzkh,xm,xb,sfzh,khlx,ybkh,lxdh,jtzz FROM gy_brjbxxk WHERE sfzh=#{idcard}
Select jzkh,xm,xb,sfzh,khlx,ybkh,lxdh,jtzz,jzcs,brlb,brxzdm FROM gy_brjbxxk WHERE jzkh=#{patid}
select jzkh,xm,xb,sfzh,khlx,ybkh,lxdh,jtzz from gy_brjbxxk where sfzh= #{idcard}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO gy_brjbxxk
jzkh,
xm,
xb,
sfzh,
lxdh,
khlx,
ybkh,
jtzz,
ldrq,brlb,brxzdm,csrq,jzcs,zycs
#{patid},
#{patname},
#{patsex},
#{idcard},
#{mobileno},
#{medcardtype},
#{medcardno},
#{address},
sysdate,#{brlb},#{brxzdm},#{csrq},0,0
mapper.update:
UPDATE gy_brjbxxk
xm = #{patname},
xb = #{patsex},
sfzh = #{idcard},
lxdh = #{mobileno},
khlx = #{medcardtype},
jzkh = #{medcardno},
jtzz = #{address},
WHERE jzkh = #{patid}
mapper.select: SELECT numid from GH_MZYYK WHERE numid=#{numid} and zt=1
SELECT checkid from GH_MZYYK WHERE checkid=#{checkid}
select YYBZ from GH_YYPBMX where PBMXXH = #{pbmxxh}
SELECT jzkh from gy_brjbxxk WHERE jzkh=#{jzkh}
mapper.update: UPDATE gy_xhb set dqz=dqz+1 where bm = #{tableName}
mapper.select: select DQZ from gy_xhb where bm = #{tableName}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO GH_MZYYK
YYXH,
XM,
XB,
CSRQ,
SFZH,
LXDH,
YYRQ1,
YYRQ2,
PBXH,
KSDM,
YSGH,
ZT,
YYLB,
YYSJ,
GHXH,
MZLBXH,
JZKH,
USERID,
CHECKID,
NUMID,
JTZZ,
XXCZID,
CZGH,
DJRQ,
JKXX,
YYSJD,
#{yyxh},
#{xm},
#{xb},
to_date(#{csrq},'yyyy-MM-dd'),
#{sfzh},
#{lxdh},
to_date(#{yyrq1},'yyyy-MM-dd'),
to_date(#{yyrq2},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
#{pbxh},
#{ksdm},
#{ysgh},
#{zt},
#{yylb},
#{yysj},
#{ghxh},
#{mzlbxh},
#{jzkh},
#{userid},
#{checkid},
#{numid},
#{jtzz},
#{xxczid},
#{czgh},
to_date(#{djrq},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
#{jkxx},
#{yysjd},

INSERT INTO GH_YYPBMX
pbmxxh,
pbjlxh,
yylxdm,
ghsjlb,
yyghxh,
#{numid},
#{schid},
#{yylxdm},
#{ampm},
#{no},
mapper.update:
UPDATE GH_MZYYK SET zt=-1, yylb=0 WHERE numid=#{numid} and zt=0
AND yyrq1=to_date(#{numdate},'yyyy-MM-dd')
UPDATE GH_MZYYK SET zt= 1 AND JLXH = #{jlxh} WHERE yyxh=#{yyxh} and zt=0
mapper.select: select yybz,count(yybz)num from GH_YYPBMX where PBJLXH = #{pbjlxh} AND GHSJLB=#{ampm} GROUP BY yybz
select count(1) from gh_mzyyk where zt in(0,1) and pbxh = #{pbjlxh} AND yysj=#{ampm} and to_char(yyrq1,'yyyy-mm-dd')=#{appdate}
select jlxh,ksdm,mzlbxh,ysgh from gh_yzpbk where jlxh = #{schid}
mapper.update: UPDATE GH_YYPBMX SET YYBZ = 1 WHERE PBMXXH = #{pbmxxh}
UPDATE GH_YYPBMX SET YYBZ = 0 WHERE PBMXXH = #{pbmxxh}
mapper.select: select distinct ll.register_fee regfee,ll.clinic_fee treatfee, ll.doctor_code docCode,ll.dept_code depCode,ll.am_pm timeType, ll.jlxh pbCode,xx.xm,xx.xb,c.mc,s.ksmc from GH_SCHEDUL ll left join gy_zgxx xx on xx.zgid = ll.doctor_code and xx.zybz in(0,5) left join (select * from gy_gydm where dmlb = 13) c on xx.zc = c.dm left join gy_ksdm s on s.ksdm = ll.dept_code where s.zfpb = 0 and ll.dept_code = #{ksdm}

select pbmx.ghsjlb,pbk.ksdm,pbk.mzlbxh,ksd.ksmc,pbk.ysgh from GH_YYPBMX pbmx left join GH_YZPBK pbk on pbmx.pbjlxh = pbk.jlxh left join gy_ksdm ksd on ksd.ksdm = pbk.ksdm where pbmx.yybz = 1 and pbmx.pbmxxh = #{numid}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO GH_GHK
ysgh,
jlxh,jzkh,jzcs,brxm,brlb,brxz,mzlbxh,pbxh,ksdm,ghrq,ghxh,sjlb,zlf,czgh,fybh,ydjylsh,czrq,thbz,paymode
#{ysgh},
#{jlxh}, #{jzkh}, #{jzcs}, #{brxm}, #{brlb}, #{brxz}, #{mzlbxh}, #{pbxh}, #{ksdm}, to_date(#{ghrq},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{ghxh}, #{sjlb}, #{zlf}, #{czgh}, #{fybh}, #{jylsh}, to_date(#{czrq},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),#{thbz},#{payModel}
mapper.select: select (select ks.ksmc from gy_ksdm ks where ks.ksdm=b.dept_code) deptname, b.dept_code deptCode, b.doctor_name docname, b.docrank docrank, b.register_fee regfee, b.register_fee+b.clinic_fee treatfee, b.clinic_fee regamt, sysdate visitdate, decode(b.am_pm,1,'08:00:00-11:30:00',2,'13:00:00-16:30:00') visittime, b.wz visitaddress, c.yyghxh seqnum from GH_SCHEDUL b,GH_YYPBMX c where b.jlxh=c.pbjlxh and c.ghsjlb = b.am_pm and c.pbmxxh=#{ghInVo.numid} and c.pbjlxh=#{ghInVo.schid} and c.ghsjlb=#{ghInVo.ampm} and c.yybz=0

select (select dqz from gy_xhb where bm='GH_MZYYK' ) regid, c.ksmc deptname, (select zg.xm from gy_zgxx zg where a.ysgh=zg.zgid) docname, b.mzlbmc docrank, nvl(b.ghf,0) regfee, decode(c.jiagelb,'3',nvl(b.zlf_et,0),nvl(b.zlf,0))+nvl(b.ghf,0) treatfee, decode(c.jiagelb,'3',nvl(b.zlf_et,0),nvl(b.zlf,0)) regamt, a.yyrq1 visitdate, decode(a.yysj,1,'08:00:00-11:30:00',2,'13:00:00-16:30:00') visittime, c.wz visitaddress, a.ghxh seqnum from Gh_mzyyk a,gh_mzlbk b,gy_ksdm c where a.mzlbxh=b.mzlbxh and a.ksdm = c.ksdm and a.zt=0 and a.numid=#{ghInVo.numid} and a.jzkh=#{ghInVo.patid} and a.yysj=#{ghInVo.ampm} and to_char(a.yyrq1,'yyyymmdd')=#{ghInVo.visitdate} and a.pbxh=#{ghInVo.schid}
select jzkh,jzcs,ghxh,jlxh,to_char(ghrq,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')ghrq,sjlb from gh_ghk where jlxh=#{preid}
select jzkh,jzcs,ghxh from gh_ghk where jzkh=#{ghsfVo.jzkh} and jzcs=#{ghsfVo.jzcs} and ghxh=#{ghsfVo.ghxh} and thbz = 1 and jlxh = #{ghsfVo.jlxh}
select jzxh from zj_jzxx where jlxh = #{jlxh}

SELECT count(1) FROM GH_MBZHGL a,gh_yzpbk b where a.ksdm=b.ksdm and a.ysgh=b.ysgh and a.xq=b.xq --and s.rq between a.ksrq and a.jsrq and a.czrq > sysdate-90 and b.jlxh=#{schid} and a.ksdm=#{deptid} and a.ysgh=#{docid} and to_date(#{appdate},'yyyy-MM-dd') between a.ksrq and a.jsrq and a.swjsh < 0

SELECT count(1) FROM GH_MBZHGL a,gh_yzpbk b where a.ksdm=b.ksdm and a.ysgh=b.ysgh and a.xq=b.xq --and s.rq between a.ksrq and a.jsrq and a.czrq > sysdate-90 and b.jlxh=#{schid} and a.ksdm=#{deptid} and a.ysgh=#{docid} and to_date(#{appdate},'yyyy-MM-dd') between a.ksrq and a.jsrq and a.xwjsh < 0
